DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine whether use telecommunication tool , specifically web page contain online screen instrument real-time video chat , efficient way implement Major Depressive Disorder screen among college student . The study also aim determine proactive depression screen free online consultation psychiatrist increase rate help-seeking among college student MDD . Eligible participant complete demographic survey depression screen assessment online . Those subject express suicidality depressive symptom offer opportunity complete one-time psychiatric consultation Skype video-conferencing .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : All consider current undergraduate Massachusetts college encourage participate .
